text: The Costa Rica national under-20 football team represents Costa Rica in under-20 international football. They have qualified for the FIFA U-20 World Cup nine times with their best placing of fourth position coming in 2009. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup=== Year Round Position * 1977 Did
